SciTri Battle

An exciting competition where participants showcase their skills in Physics, Chemistry, and Mathematics!

About the Event

SciTri Battle is an exciting competition where participants showcase their skills in Physics, Chemistry, and Mathematics! Get ready to explore, identify, and solve challenges across three engaging rounds that test knowledge and critical thinking. Dive in, compete, and excel!

Event Details

Event Type: Team of 3 students (2 teams from each college)

Round 1: Bridge of Brilliance

Construct a paper bridge that can carry weight within a limited time, demonstrating both creativity and engineering skills.

Round 2: Chemergence

Test knowledge of chemistry terms, elements, and properties through two sections:

Section 1: Chemistry Terms and Identification

  • Identify elements, compounds, or terms based on image clues.

Section 2: Properties and Uses

  • Match elements/compounds to their correct properties and uses.

Round 3: Maths Fiesta

Solve mathematical questions and reasoning problems within the time limit.

Topics Include: Number series, pattern completion, and analogies.

Rules & Regulations

  • Materials: Use only the provided paper and adhesive materials (like tape). No external tools.
  • Time Limit: Finish the bridge within the allotted time.
  • Teams will receive questions from various mathematical concepts.
  • Complete responses within the designated time limit.

Judging Criteria

  • Round 1: Stability, Weight Support, Design & Structure
  • Round 2: Accuracy, Comprehension
  • Round 3: Accuracy, Thoroughness, Speed
